step1.title: Step 1: Your Interests
step1.subtitle: Let's start by understanding what you're here to achieve.
step1.description: Let's personalize your experience. To start, which program are you interested in?

step2.title: Step 2: Your Skill Level
step2.subtitle: This helps us tailor your experience to the right level.
step2.heading: What is your skill level?
step2.description: This will help us match you with the right coaches and content.

beginner.title: Beginner
beginner.description: Just starting out, 0-2 years of experience.

advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.description: Expert in the field, 5+ years of experience.

step3.title: Step 3: Your Commitment
step3.subtitle: Let us know how much time you can dedicate to your growth.
step3.heading: How much time can you commit?
step3.description: This will help us find the perfect time for your coaching sessions.
step3.missingInfo: Some information is missing. Please go back and complete all steps.
step3.saveError: Could not save your profile. Please try again.

step1.title: Step 1: Your Professional Background
step1.description: Let's start with your current role and professional presence.
step1.heading: Your Role & Profile
step1.subheading: What's your current professional role? Please share your LinkedIn profile as well.

step2.title: Step 2: Areas of Expertise
step2.description: Help students find you by listing your specialties.
step2.heading: Your Expertise
step2.subheading: What are your key areas of expertise? Add a few tags that best describe your skills.
step2.placeholder: Type a specialty and press Enter...

step3.title: Step 3: Your Motivation
step3.description: Help us understand what drives you to help others succeed.
step3.heading: Your "Why"
step3.subheading: What motivates you to coach and mentor others?
step3.label: Motivation
step3.placeholder: Share a brief summary of why you're passionate about coaching...

step4.title: Step 4: Your Coaching Style
step4.description: How do you approach guiding your students?
step4.heading: Your Approach
step4.subheading: Briefly describe your coaching style. How do you help students find solutions?
step4.label: Coaching Style
step4.placeholder: e.g., 'I focus on asking powerful questions to help students uncover their own answers...'

step5.title: Step 5: Availability & Rates
step5.description: Finally, let's set your availability and compensation expectations.
step5.heading: Logistics
step5.subheading: What is your availability and desired hourly rate?
step5.authError: You must be logged in to submit an application.
step5.submitError: Could not submit your application. Please try again.
